metadata.name: Is this job part of ACC?

title: Manager, Field Operations
content:
Airbnb was born in 2007 when two Hosts welcomed three guests to their San Francisco home, and has since grown to over 4 million Hosts who have welcomed more than 1 billion guest arrivals in almost every country across the globe. Every day, Hosts offer unique stays and experiences that make it possible for guests to connect with communities in a more authentic way.The Community You Will Join:
The Hosting Geos Team ensures that Airbnb is locally relevant and serves the needs of our global hosts and guests, helping regions more efficiently plan and execute growth strategies across Hosting in a way that will resonate with our communities.
The Difference You will Make:
In this position you will lead a team of market managers and be responsible for the end-to-end strategy for supply acquisition, host quality, account management and optimization in the assigned markets. This role will cover Brazil and Spanish South America.
A Typical Day: 

Motivate and lead a team of Market Managers who are responsible for maximizing partner relationships with Airbnb Homes Hosts, with the goal of maximizing KPIs and business performance. Guide the Market Managers on territory and local strategies in their assigned geos focused on supply optimization and supply acquisition
Proactively design, set, execute, report and iterate on targeted in-territory supply strategy and tactics
Partner with the Hosting Geos leadership and other teams within Airbnb to drive cross-functional business initiatives
Own and drive accountability for the business performance of the assigned territory, by  meeting or exceeding revenue goals, bringing on new quality partners, upselling existing partners, driving up supply business KPIs, along with measuring partner engagement and performance
Own supply acquisition and optimization key results and accurate forecasts
Partner with counterparts in other offices around the world to share strategic insights and collaborate on global & cross-functional initiatives
Drive scalable and attributable levers to reach objectives and key results in the territory
Complete quarterly forecasting, planning and reporting sessions, with the support of the Country Manager, Brazil and Spanish South America
Identify key barriers, levers, market shifts and trends, and provide solutions to overcome them
Coach team members to achieve their maximum potential in their current role while developing them for future roles within the organization
Proactively develops and leads innovative cross functional initiatives that drive regional impact and can be rolled out to other teams globally

Your Expertise:

10+ years of relevant global operations experience with at least 3+ years in a management role managing teams.
A bold and compassionate leader with a proven ability to grow, develop and scale high performing teams.
Serves as a go-to for team members when they have questions and provide clear direction, business coaching, and ongoing training.
Can leverage data to propose new business opportunities for the larger team and a strategic portfolio across distinct and varying market stages. Ability to influence product, policy, and other cross functional stakeholders to attain new revenue streams for direct team or region.
Can lead training series.
Ability to leverage tools to understand how larger businesses and other individuals are performing.
Expertise in achieving strong results managing through others 
Ability to successfully and confidently performance manage team members
Knows how to create a positive and driven team culture
Considered an expert in the assigned territory.
Shares learnings and independently influences cross functional partners to support relevant goals
Ability to organize, lead and execute on a variety of assignments and action plans
Previous relevant experience in growing supply and working with Community groups

Our Commitment To Inclusion & Belonging:
Airbnb is committed to working with the broadest talent pool possible. We believe diverse ideas foster innovation and engagement, and allow us to attract creatively-led people, and to develop the best products, services and solutions. All qualified individuals are encouraged to apply.

questions.label: How did you hear about this job?
Would you require visa sponsorship to work in the country in which this position is based?

questions.description:
O Airbnb está comprometido em criar um ambiente de trabalho diversificado. Nesse sentido, para medir nossos esforços, convidamos os candidatos a identificarem o seu gênero, etnia, e se são portadores de deficiência. Respostas a essas perguntas são totalmente voluntárias, e a recusa em fornecer tais informações não o sujeitará a tratamento adverso ou retaliação. As respostas que você fornecer serão mantidas em sigilo e não serão compartilhadas com os gerentes responsáveis pelo seu processo seletivo. (Airbnb is committed to creating a diverse work environment. In this regard, to measure our efforts, we invite candidates to identify their gender, ethnicity, and whether they have a disability. Answers to these questions are entirely voluntary, and your refusal to provide such information will not subject you to adverse treatment or retaliation. The answers you provide will be kept confidential and will not be shared with the managers responsible for your selection process.)

 

Todos os indivíduos que procuram emprego no Airbnb são considerados, independentemente de raça, etnia, cor, religião, nacionalidade, idade, sexo, estado civil, ascendência, deficiência física ou mental, identidade de gênero, orientação sexual ou qualquer outra característica legalmente protegida. Você está tendo a oportunidade de fornecer as informações para nos ajudar a medir nossos próprios esforços de inclusão e diversidade e para cumprir nossos padrões internos de igualdade de oportunidades de emprego. (All individuals seeking employment on Airbnb are considered, regardless of race, ethnicity, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, physical or mental disability, gender identity, sexual orientation or any other legally protected characteristic. You are being given the opportunity to provide the information to help us measure our own inclusion and diversity efforts and to meet our internal equal employment opportunity standards.)

 

Todos os seus dados pessoais, incluindo gênero, etnia, e deficiência, se você optar por fornecer tais informações, serão coletados, armazenados e processados de acordo com o Aviso de Privacidade de Dados do Airbnb. (All of your personal data, including gender, ethnicity, and disability, if you choose to provide such information, will be collected, stored and processed in accordance with Airbnb's Data Privacy Notice.)

 

Clique aqui para ler o Aviso de Privacidade de Dados do Airbnb e clique abaixo para aceitá-lo. Este Aviso de Privacidade não é um contrato, expresso ou implícito, e não define termos ou condições de emprego. (Click here to read the Airbnb Data Privacy Notice and click below to accept it. This Privacy Notice is not a contract, express or implied, and does not set out terms or conditions of employment.)
questions.label: Aviso de Privacidade de Dados do Airbnb (Airbnb Data Privacy Notice) - Brazil

values.label: Aceito os termos do Aviso de Privacidade de Dados do Airbnb. (I accept the terms of the Airbnb Data Privacy Notice.)

questions.label: O gênero com o qual você se identifica (The gender you identify with) - Brazil
O grupo étnico-racial com o qual você se identifica. Você se declara uma pessoa: (The ethnic-racial group you identify with. You declare yourself as:) - Brazil
Se você é portador(a) de deficiência (Do you have a disability?) - Brazil

values.label: Sim, sou portador(a) de deficiência (Yes, I have a disability)
Não, não sou portador(a) de deficiência (No, i do not have a disability)
